title: Hearts in paradise
creator_credit: Judith Hewitson and Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School
brief_description: The lifestyle of Jo, a new wave singer, is compared and contrasted with Teresa, a would-be mothercraft worker. This is viewed against the background of society’s general resistance and non-comprehension of that which is new and different.
